title: Freljordian Diplomacy

replies.body: One of the few that actually made me giggle, good luck!

That. Was. Brilliant. Great characters with spot on dialogue. There's a really warm feel throughout the whole thing and the breakfast scene was really fun :) The twist was clever and the resolution even more so. Great one!
Hilarious - loved the red herring too. Good stuff.

The interaction between the characters is hilarious and true to their personalities. I would've liked a little bit more about Ashe's marriage, though. Don't know if you meant it, but I thought she was married to Gragas :P
ty pal, its up to you to interpret it any way you want
